body:
Hello everyone!

This is a small post so that we can get to know each other a bit more better.
If you are feeling down today, make sure to read what the person above you describes you.
Also, it is a great way to look and reflect on your weak parts.

People who write their opinions to the person above, if you want that person to improve on something, I would appreciate it if you can tell them so in such a manner that it does not offend the person.

I hope this thread does not create a flame war.
If it does happen, I would appreciate if staff can lock it this thread.

I hope to see this thread full of compliments, and improvements!
So, what are we waiting for?
Let's start!

I hope you guys enjoy it.
body_tagged:

title: Your opinions on the person above you
